lead_paragraph: D'ARCY--Margaret Cecelia, 94, sixty year Scarsdale resident, died March 21 in White Plains. She is survived by Christine, David and Stephen D'Arcy, Karen Couzens plus five grandchildren. Wake is Saturday, March 26, Bennett Funeral Home, 824 Scarsdale Ave, 2 to 5pm; funeral Mass at IHM Church, Scarsdale, Monday, March 28, 10am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  D'ARCY, MARGARET CECELIA
